name: Zerealia
startIntroPart1: Hail, GOD chosen Prophet, head of the Alkins dynasty. You are the leader of a nation called Zerealia, whose people has had an history of war and resistance. Your reign was eulogized as the Prospered Reign of Prosperity, as it was recognized for the extensive administrative, military, education and fiscal reforms you instituted, the eradication of the Thalmor from the world, and a cultural revolution that replaced the old aristocracy with a generation of religious scientists. Even after the disappearance of the Bach Viet dynasty, your nation resisted hardships that would have destroyed the strongest empire, and is today one of the most prosperous countries in all of EurAsia.
startIntroPart2: Wise and revered leader of Zerealia, your nation in now in need of your help to achieve greater glory. Will you guide Zerealia once again and bring your people to greater prosperity, until Zerealia becomes the center of the world? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
defeated: That's not an end. It's merely a beginning of your problems!
introduction: Hello~I'm of the Great Prophet of Akinia. Have nice day
afterPeace: I am glad the war is finally over.
